meanings.definition: The springs that support a mattress on a bed.
meanings.sent1: The old bed creaked as I sat on the bedsprings.
meanings.sent2: She could feel the bedsprings poking through the mattress.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loved to hide under the bed and play with the bedsprings.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like a tangled mess of bedsprings, full of twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the bedsprings squeaking kept him awake all night.

meanings.definition: A type of metal coil used in mattresses.
meanings.sent1: The bedsprings in the new mattress provided excellent support.
meanings.sent2: The salesman explained the benefits of using high-quality bedsprings in mattresses.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the bedsprings were a fun toy to bat around.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like the bouncing of bedsprings.
meanings.sent5: The bedsprings hummed softly as she settled into bed for the night.
